channel.title: Go Back To Home
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Go Back To Home

item.title: Broadcast Address
item.description: Broadcast address, which is at the end of the Subnet Mask at 255, essentially is used to communicate between all devices on a network Fun example: Device: “Hey, CAN SOMEONE SAY SOMETHING???” ...

item.title: Subnet Mask
item.description: Subnet masking is where you divide the IP into two parts, one for the host, other for the network 10.0.0.0 255.0.0.0 means that 10 cannot be modified, but the rest can ...

item.title: Trustless Manner
item.description: You don’t need to know any individual person to agree on an issue, it’s okay since the majority agrees on something. A democratic vote.

item.title: DApp
item.description: When you use the blockchain, you need a decentralised app, all of these have Smart Contracts and are the building blocks for DApps.

item.title: Smart Contracts
item.description: Smart contracts are small programs made to observe, accomplish and implement agreements automatically It’s an agreement that ensures the conditions are followed and respected ...

item.title: Block Reward
item.description: If a miner is successful, they can receive the currency, but it is only for one node/person and is extremely power hungry.

item.title: Mining in crypto
item.description: Mining is the process to determin the validatiy of the block, while creating new blocks, transactions are verified then added to the blockchain and to the Full Node and Super Node It ...
